languages.text: {n}Резкий тон, скованная поза Махария и его недружелюбный взгляд отзываются в вас взаимной неприязнью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Резкий тон, скованная поза Махария и его недружелюбный взгляд отзываются в вас взаимной неприязнью".

languages.text: {n}You take in Macharius Sauerback's harsh tone, stiff posture, and hostile gaze. The feeling is decidedly mutual.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Резкий тон, скованная поза Махария и его недружелюбный взгляд отзываются в вас взаимной неприязнью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A harsh tone, a stiff pose and the unfriendly gaze of Macharius echo in you with a mutual dislike towards him.{/n}
{n}A harsh tone, a stiff pose and the unfriendly gaze of Macharius echo in you with a mutual dislike towards him.{/n}
{n}Macharius' harsh tone, stiff posture, and unfriendly evoke a mutual dislike toward him in you.{/n}

{n}You take in Macharius Sauerback's harsh tone, stiff posture, and hostile gaze. The feeling is decidedly mutual.{/n}
{n}You take in Macharius Sauerback's harsh tone, stiff posture, and hostile gaze. The feeling is decidedly mutual.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マハリウス・ザウアーバックの厳しい口調、堅苦しい態度、敵対的な眼差しをあなたは受け止める。その感覚は共通のものだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You take in Macharius Sauerback's harsh tone, stiff posture, and hostile gaze. The feeling is decidedly mutual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マハリウス・ザウアーバックの厳しい口調、堅苦しい態度、敵対的な眼差しをあなたは受け止める。その感覚は共通のものだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}马卡里乌斯严厉的口吻、生硬的姿态和不友善的态度同样激起了你对他的不满。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You take in Macharius Sauerback's harsh tone, stiff posture, and hostile gaze. The feeling is decidedly mutual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}马卡里乌斯严厉的口吻、生硬的姿态和不友善的态度同样激起了你对他的不满。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Son ton sévère, sa posture rigide et le regard hostile qu'il vous adresse ne laissent pas de place au doute. L'aversion qu'il vous inspire est réciproque.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You take in Macharius Sauerback's harsh tone, stiff posture, and hostile gaze. The feeling is decidedly mutual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Son ton sévère, sa posture rigide et le regard hostile qu'il vous adresse ne laissent pas de place au doute. L'aversion qu'il vous inspire est réciproque.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Recibes el tono arisco, la postura rígida y la mirada hostil de Macharius Sauerback haciéndote eco. El sentimiento es indiscutiblemente mutuo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You take in Macharius Sauerback's harsh tone, stiff posture, and hostile gaze. The feeling is decidedly mutual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Recibes el tono arisco, la postura rígida y la mirada hostil de Macharius Sauerback haciéndote eco. El sentimiento es indiscutiblemente mutuo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du lässt Macharius Sauerbacks barschen Ton, seine steife Haltung und seine feindseligen Blicke auf dich wirken. Das Gefühl beruht eindeutig auf Gegenseitigkeit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You take in Macharius Sauerback's harsh tone, stiff posture, and hostile gaze. The feeling is decidedly mutual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius' harscher Ton, seine steife Haltung und seine allgemeine Feindseligkeit wecken auch in dir sofort eine Antipathie gegen ihn.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Macharius Sauerback'in katı tonlaması, dik duruşu ve haşin bakışları gözüne çarpıyor. Belli ki hisleriniz karşılıklı.{/n}
